display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
DePaul Faculty Member
How can I use Argonne to advance my work?

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
APS
Advanced Photon Source
X-ray beamtime for materials, energy, bio, quantum

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
div.span: Steps:1. Identify beamline 2. Contact beamline scientist 3. Submit proposal via UPS 4. Complete training + run experiment

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
CNM
Center for Nanoscale Materials
Nanofabrication + characterization + theory

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
div.span: Steps:1. Register as user 2. Discuss feasibility with staff 3. Submit proposal in CNM Portal 4. Schedule instrument time

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
div.span: Steps:1. Choose allocation path (DD / INCITE / ALCC) 2. Submit computing request 3. Add team members 4. Begin HPC runs

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Faculty Programs
Sabbatical, visiting scientist, guest researcher

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Graduate Programs
Research appointments
Graduate research internships
Specialized research schools

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Undergraduate Programs
Research internships
Community college programs
Summer research experiences

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Professional & Career Internship Program (PCI)
Paid internships
Includes technical AND non-technical roles
(communications, business, policy, computing, design)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Graduate Students
Co-advise with Argonne scientists
Joint publications
Facility-based thesis work

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Undergraduate Students
Research internships
Summer placements
Pipeline into graduate study

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Non-Technical Students
Design, visualization, communication,
business, entrepreneurship,
policy and sustainability analysis
